Package controller

Class AddModifyCustomerController

java.lang.Object
controller.AddModifyCustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddModifyCustomerController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller class handles the data flow and operations associated with the view defined by AddModifyCustomer.fxml.

  • Constructor Details

    • AddModifyCustomerController

  • Method Details

    • onActionCancel

      void onActionCancel(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      The onActionCancel method is an event handler that allows users to cancel adding or updating a customer and returning to the main view. This method calls the returnToMain method in MainView, which allows for the same logic to handle cancellation in both the AddModifyCustomer and AddModifyController views.
      Parameters:
      event - listens for the cancel button to be clicked.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSave

      void onActionSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The onActionSave method is an event handler that saves a new customer or updates an existing customer. The static boolean setToModify defines whether an update(setToModify = true) or add(setToModify = false) is to be performed. This method includes many statements to check that all fields have been filed out appropriately. If all fields are filled out, the method will either call the DAO.CustomerQuery.addCustomer() or DAO.CustomerQuery.updateCustomer(). These methods will respectively add a new record to the database or update a database record.

    • setFirstLevel

      public static javafx.collections.transformation.FilteredList<FirstLevelDivision> setFirstLevel(Country country)
      LAMBDA USE: This method uses a lambda on a FilteredList to select first level divisions that match the input Country's countryID. This approach requires less lines of logic than would be required to accomplish this same outcome with conditional statements and a loop. The setFirstLevel method creates a list of all First Level Divisions with a specific Country ID.
      Parameters:
      country - the Country whose ID must match all First Level Division Country IDs.
      Returns:
      the filtered list of First Level Divisions for the specified country.

    • onCountrySelected

      void onCountrySelected(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      The onCountrySelected method is an event handler that sets the firstLevelComboBox with First Level Divisions from the selected country.
      Parameters:
      event - listens for a country to be selected from the countryComboBox

    • modifyExistingCustomer

      public void modifyExistingCustomer(Customer customer)
      The modifyExistingCustomer method is called from the Main View when an existed customer is selected from Main's customer table view. This method takes the attributes of the selected customer and uses them to populate the update customer form with the customer's current data. This method also sets the setToModify boolean to true, so that the onActionSave method knows to update an existing database record rather than add a new one.
      Parameters:
      customer - is the customer to be modified.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This initialize method includes statements to populate the countryComboBox items and prompt text, as well as the firstLevelComboBox prompt text.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
